name: KiCad Libraries Exception to CC-BY-SA-4.0
notes:
this is always an execption to the CC-BY-SA-4.0 license. and the homepage introduces
this expection this way "The KiCad libraries are licensed under the Creative Commons CC-BY-SA
4.0 License, with the following exception." We used to track this as cc-by-sa-4.0 WITH generic-exception
license_body:
To the extent that the creation of electronic designs that use 'Licensed Material'
can be considered to be 'Adapted Material', then the copyright holder waives article
3 of the license with respect to these designs and any generated files which use
data provided as part of the 'Licensed Material'.
